Entries.ResponseBody:
{
  "id": "/subscriptions/075423e9-7d33-4166-8bdf-3920b04e3735/resourceGroups/michalresourcegroup/providers/Microsoft.Security/IoTSecuritySolutions/Locations/westus/default/IoT_CryptoMiner/2020-03-15",
  "name": "/subscriptions/075423e9-7d33-4166-8bdf-3920b04e3735/resourceGroups/michalresourcegroup/providers/Microsoft.Security/IoTSecuritySolutions/Locations/westus/default/IoT_CryptoMiner/2020-03-15",
  "type": "Microsoft.Security/IoTSecurityAggregatedAlert",
  "properties": {
    "alertType": "IoT_CryptoMiner",
    "alertDisplayName": "Crypto coin miner image",
    "aggregatedDateUtc": "2020-03-15",
    "vendorName": "Microsoft",
    "count": 2,
    "effectedResourceType": "IoT Device",
    "systemSource": "Devices",
    "actionTaken": "Detected",
    "remediationSteps": "Verify with the user that ran the command this was legitimate activity on the device. If not, escalate the alert to the information security team.",
    "topDevicesList": null,
    "reportedSeverity": "High",
    "description": "Execution of a process normally associated with digital currency mining detected.",
    "logAnalyticsQuery": "SecurityAlert | where tolower(ResourceId) == tolower('/subscriptions/075423e9-7d33-4166-8bdf-3920b04e3735/resourcegroups/michalresourcegroup/providers/microsoft.devices/iothubs/michaldemohub') and tolower(AlertName) == tolower('Crypto coin miner image') and TimeGenerated > datetime(2020-03-15T00:00:00Z) and TimeGenerated < datetime(2020-03-16T00:00:00Z) | extend DeviceId=parse_json(ExtendedProperties)['DeviceId'] | project DeviceId, TimeGenerated, DisplayName, AlertSeverity, Description, RemediationSteps, ExtendedProperties"
  }
}
